AND A.CATE IN('001','002')
AND A.STATUS = #status#
AND A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #keyword# || '%'
AND (A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #keyword# || '%' OR A.CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #keyword# || '%')
AND A.MAIN_YN = #main_yn#
) WHERE rnum > #POS_STA# AND rnum <= #POS_END#
